data.title: Won't go back
data.text: This used to be a good place. Now the staff doesn't seem to care. Old food in the buffet  lines. Bathrooms are filthy and smell bad. My friend got sick from the smell.

data.title: So much food to choose from
data.text: My husband was in the mood for Chinese food. Found the reviews to be rather good so we thought we'd give it a try. It was very good and almost had too many selections if you can imagine that being a bad thing. Wait staff was very good. Came by often to remove used dishes and refill drinks.

data.title: My two sons favorite place to eat!
data.text: This place is a bit worn out and lacks cleanliness, but when it comes to the taste, we can say they do a great job. My two sons will choose this place over any other. My wife and I love it too. Just work a bit on the cleanliness and kaboom!

data.title: to much to eat!
data.text: Good Chinese and salads, there is a Mongolian grill to mix sea food and poultry to make your Asian dish but on weekend is full and take 25 min. to get your dish ready. Desserts are ok. Regular soda and Iced tea.

data.title: The grill is the best
data.text: Overall the buffet is good, but what is really outstanding is the grill, you can make your own creation, chicken, pork, beef and/or shrimp with noodles or some veggies, then they spicy it at your choice and it is the best!!!

data.title: A good chinese buffet that is great for hungry diners!
data.text: We went there for lunch.  A buffet with many choices of standard chinese buffet food.  Great selection of wonderful ice cream.  Clean restroom.  Loved the grill where someone will make up fresh, hot food.

data.title: Good Food and Buffet
data.text: Hey. Nice buffet food selection and sushi and hibachi grill too. Clean Restaurant and truck parking on street to eat. Small restroom though.

data.title: Will not eat there again...
data.text:
1st let me qualify myself... I am a "Certified Public Food Specialist", working for a international company...
let me count the issues I had at this restaurant:
1. Steam tables not holding food at temp.
2. Shrimp tasted old and tangy!! immediately disposed of dish.
3. Warewash was good, utensils were clean, plates clean.
4. Sweet Sour sauce was empty, dried up all around container..Coagulated 
5. Fried chicken pieces were cold to touch, inside definitely not to temp.
6. Bathroom was clean
7. tables were soiled and not properly sanitized between customers.
8. Peach cobbler was cold and sitting atop buffet steam table, but not heated by steam.....cold to touch and taste..
9. RAP music stuff in a Chinese restaurant.. Oh Please!!!! and too loud as well.
10. Not a place for a food, but decorations were nice!!!

I will say that the $11.00 I spent was a waste of money... If I ate the Shrimp/Chicken combo dish, I think I may have had a rough night!!
The Only redeeming item I had was the ice cream, as it was at temp and was good... Cookies and cream!!
This restaurant has allot of potential however, if they would change perspective from taking in revenue, to dispensing a quality dining experience... maybe they will have a future.
As for me and my house???... Not eating there!!
Good Luck.

data.title: Nothing spectacular
data.text: In my opinion, a little bit overpriced. Bad attitude of cashier, hostess and waitress. Good was acceptable, but nothing more. Sadly, it seems to be the "best" Chinese buffet in Laredo, so no competition means no need to make an effort. I visited in a Saturday noon. The place was less than half full, dirty dishes in some empty tables, smelly restrooms. I compare it with Chopsticks Chinese buffet in San Antonio, 20% cheaper and 50% better in food, variety and service. Next time I'm in the mood for Chinese food in Laredo, will look for a PF Changs.

data.title: Lots of Choices for Hungry People and Popular Locally
data.text: Very convenient and accessible location off I-35.  Large selection of Chinese specialties sometimes with a Tex-Mex flavor.  Food prepared well and fresh. Islands of both cold and hot foods.  Separate area for grilled items.  Reasonably priced for those that are hungry.  Large parking area.  Walking distance from the Residence Inn Del Mar Hotel.

data.title: Gross
data.text: I was very surprised by the good reviews after eating here.  I always go to trip advisor & never go wrong.  This was the first misleading review😟. The food was almost all fried selections.  Food looked like it had been sitting out a long time.  No quality.  Most importantly, this place was so dirty.  I lost my appetite by how dirty it was.

data.title: Nice place
data.text:
I have been visiting here for some years and for some reason never reviewed it, so here it is: This is one of the best buffets I have ever been to. This includes places like Las Vegas, New York,  and Hong Kong.
While you want to show up at 12:00 for lunch instead of 3:00 and 7:00 for dinner not 9:00, the food is kept fresh and full, the value is good, the selection is huge and the staff is attentive to sometimes silly degrees.
If you haven't been go at least once.

data.title: not your typical chinese
data.text: all you can eat and drink over 100 items susi and a mongolian grill beautiful on beyonce great service lunch and dinner sea food  buffet restocked often they do not take the old leftover and mix it in with the hot fresh food like the other chinese buffets.so if your in laredo tx  give lins a try you will be back.

data.title: Good Food and Service
data.text: Everything I tried was good and fresh. The server came around often to remove plates and refill drinks. Everything you would hope for in a buffet.

data.title: Super Mega Buffet
data.text: Awesome Buffet if you are a food  lover you will love the flavors and the mix of Dishes they are very creative with the food bar and the Sushi and Hibachi stations are great and all that for only $10bucks

data.title: Variedad de platillos ! Siempre lleno.
data.text: Cada vez q venimos a Laredo no puede faltar el buffet chino Lin's, empezando x el precio 11 dlls lunch y como 14 dinner . Los meseros 3 de 5 puntos como es buffet el w me toco ni se apareció , la barra de ensalada fresca , me gusta hacer mi propia comida donde tú escoges la carne y los vegetales, barra de fruta y postre bien . Ambiente bien y limpieza 3 de 5 .

data.title: China in Texas
data.text: Excelente buffet en relacion con el precio especialmente a la hora del lunch definitivamente lo recomiendo.

data.title: Mucha variedad de comida
data.text:
El lugar es grande, no tuvimos que esperar por una mesa, la atención de los meseros es OK no excelente.

Muchas variedad de comida, buen sabor.

data.title: Tienen de todo
data.text: Debo reconocer que es el buffette más grande que conozco fuera de Las Vegas. Tiene de todo, obviamente destacando la comida china. Pero hay pizzas, nugets, sushi una plancha que preparan comida mongola al momento. Si tienen mucha hambre y estómago, es el lugar indicado. El sabor de la comida no es el mejor, pero muuuy basto.

data.title: Delicioso
data.text: Siempre que vamos a Laredo Tx es el primer lugar donde comemos, el bufete es variado y delicioso, no es economico pero lo vale lo recomiendo altamente
